summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

The document is an introduction to the Call of Cthulhu role-playing game, which is set in the Cthulhu Mythos created by H.P. Lovecraft. The game allows players to explore various settings, including the 1920s Classic Era and modern-day, and can be adapted to different historical periods. The game's mechanics and themes are rooted in Lovecraft's works, which provide a foundation for understanding the horror elements used in the game. The document also provides guidance for game masters (Keepers) on how to run the game, including advice on using previously published material.
